full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` BLO BZANG DBANG CHEN DPAL 'BAR PAntI TA NO MON KHANG GI 'KHRUNGS RABS GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN ZHUGS DANG BCAS PA NI,
